parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the account that is added to the resource directory as a member for multi-account control. You can use this parameter to query the security status of the account.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
